awardEventDetails.title: 2021 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.for: TV Program of the Year
awardEventDetails.description: (THE MANDALORIAN shows us the way. Jon Favreau and his visionary collaborators prove the power of STAR WARS to thrive beyond the Skywalker saga. Set far, far away from the central battle between good and evil, this intoxicating adventure expands the galaxy with heroic purpose and a genre-busting narrative all its own. In these dark times, "Baby Yoda" and this larger found family of icons glow with a warm, laser-like light to prove that the Force will be with us - always.)

awardsHtml:
58 wins & 122 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2021 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Drama Series
Jon Favreau (executive producer) - Dave Filoni (executive producer) - Kathleen Kennedy (executive producer) - Colin Wilson (executive producer) - Karen Gilchrist (co-executive producer) - Carrie Beck (co-executive producer) - John Bartnicki (producer)
2021 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series
Giancarlo Esposito (For playing: "Moff Gideon".)
2021 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Guest Actor in a Drama Series
Timothy Olyphant (As Cobb Vanth in Chapter 9: The Marshal (2020))
2021 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Guest Actor in a Drama Series
Carl Weathers (As Greef Karga in Chapter 12: The Siege (2020))
2021 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Writing for a Drama Series
Dave Filoni (For episode "Chapter 13: The Jedi")

BAFTA Awards

2021 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Virgin Media's Must-See Moment
(Season finale.)

Grammy Awards

2022 Nominee Grammy
Best Score Soundtrack for Visual Media
Ludwig Göransson (composer) (For "Season 2 – Vol. 2 (Chapters 13-16)")

Outstanding Achievement in Casting - Television Series - Drama
Sarah Finn

AFI Awards, USA

2021 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(THE MANDALORIAN shows us the way. Jon Favreau and his visionary collaborators prove the power of STAR WARS to thrive beyond the Skywalker saga. Set far, far away from the central battle between good and evil, this intoxicating adventure expands the galaxy with heroic purpose and a genre-busting narrative all its own. In these dark times, "Baby Yoda" and this larger found family of icons glow with a warm, laser-like light to prove that the Force will be with us - always.)
